thread.title: Race calendar (Oct. 11)
thread.title_full: Race calendar (Oct. 11) - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Race calendar (Oct. 11)
text:
Race calendar
• Dash for Diversity, 9K Relay, Delaware Park, Buffalo, 10 a.m. Sunday, 864-5493.
• Homeless Female Veterans 5K, 136 Cazenovia St., Buffalo, 11 a.m. Sunday.
• Niagara Falls Firefighters Christmas Toy Fund 5K, LaSalle Waterfront Park, Niagara Falls, 10 a.m. Saturday, 622-9855.
• Pumpkin Run, 5K, 6350 Main St., Williamsville, 10:30 a.m. Saturday, 783-3219.
• Tim Hortons 5K Coffee Run, 8289 N. Main St., Eden, 10:30 a.m. Saturday, 445-0047.
• Run for Your Life!, 5K, Historic Batavia Cemetery in Batavia, 6:30 p.m. Saturday.
• Ridge Walk & Run, 15 miles, 10K & 5K, S. Brooklyn Ave. at Alfred St. College, Wellsville, 9 a.m. Oct. 18, (585) 593-5080.
• Lou Reuter Scholarship Run, 5K, 540 Parkhurst Blvd.. Tonawanda, 10 a.m. Oct. 18, 874-8402.
• Monster Scramble, 5K, Holy Cross Cemetary in Lackawanna, 10 a.m. Oct. 18, 634-2573 x70503.
• Medina Loyal Sports 5K, 3875 Bates Road, Medina, 1 p.m. Oct. 18, (585) 590-0878.
